response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $10,000. Given its worth and potential benefits, I believe it could also be highly beneficial for you, considering its estimated value to you at $8,000. To ensure a fair transaction, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
